\documentclass[a4paper,12pt]{article}

\usepackage{fontspec}
\usepackage{sectsty}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{listings}
\usepackage{xcolor}

\geometry{margin=1in}

\defaultfontfeatures{Ligatures=TeX}

\setmainfont[
  Path=fonts/,
  UprightFont = CormorantGaramond-Regular.ttf,
  ItalicFont = CormorantGaramond-Italic.ttf,
  BoldFont = CormorantGaramond-Bold.ttf,
  BoldItalicFont = CormorantGaramond-BoldItalic.ttf,
]{Cormorant Garamond}

\setmonofont[
  Path=fonts/,
  UprightFont = IosevkaSS10-Regular.ttf,
  ItalicFont = IosevkaSS10-Oblique.ttf,
  BoldFont = IosevkaSS10-Bold.ttf,
  BoldItalicFont = IosevkaSS10-BoldOblique.ttf,
]{Iosevka SS10}

\newfontfamily\CormorantSCBold[
  Path=fonts/,
  UprightFont = CormorantSC-Bold.ttf,
]{Cormorant SC Bold}

\allsectionsfont{\CormorantSCBold}

\input{./meta.tex}

\begin{document}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents

\cleardoublepage

\input{./output.tex}

\end{document}
